def_en: If one thing blots out another thing, it is in front of the other thing and prevents it from being seen.

def_cn: 抹去（记忆）；排除，挤掉（其他想法或记忆）
def_en: If you try to blot out a memory, you try to forget it. If one thought or memory blots out other thoughts or memories, it becomes the only one that you can think about.
